name: 計算組合
description:
In this one-semester course we will introduce the symmetric functions. Symmetric function plays a core topic in modern enumerative and algebraic combinatorics.  
Topics to be covered:
1. Symmetric functions
2. Various basis
3. Hall product
4. Tableaux and skew tableaux
5. RSK algorithm
6. Plane partitions
7. Connections with representation theory and others
goals: 能解決計量的應用問題
能運用組合數學解決相關領域的問題
syllabus:
In this one-semester course we will introduce Coxeter combinatorics, focusing on Eulerian numbers, permutations and other connections. We will cover most of the following topics:

Eulerian numbers/ Coxeter groups/ Coxeter complex/ Catalan numbers/ Narayana numbers/ Euler numbers/ permutations statistics/ paper reading

If time allowed, we will introduce some basic concepts in combinatorial topology. 

Each week students are required to lecture a portion of the assigned topic alternatively, with set of exercises. In final weeks each student will be assigned a research paper to read and report.

\[Notice for the Wuhan-epidemic\]

To cope with the 16-week semester, our space will somewhat accelerate. Some materials will be assigned as "self study".

In-class discussions and presentation are required, no prerequisite is required.
